file.name: CustomerBilling.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Customer Billing
  description: This service domains provides a central service to compose, issue and track customer billing and invoices
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/CustomerBilling/10.0.0
paths:
  /CustomerBilling/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - CustomerBillingProcedure
      summary: InCR Initiate customer billing for a customer
      description: InCR Initiate customer billing for a customer
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CustomerBillingProcedure'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateCustomerBillingProcedureResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - CustomerBillingProcedure
      summary: UpCR Update details of a customer billing transaction
      description: UpCR Update details of a customer billing transaction
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CustomerBillingProcedure'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CustomerBillingProcedure'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - CustomerBillingProcedure
      summary: ExCR Execute an automated action against an active bill (e.g. resubmit)
      description: ExCR Execute an automated action against an active bill (e.g. resubmit)
      operationId: Execute
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CustomerBillingProcedure'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CustomerBillingProcedure'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - CustomerBillingProcedure
      summary: RqCR Request manual intervention with an active billing procedure
      description: RqCR Request manual intervention with an active billing procedure
      operationId: Request
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CustomerBillingProcedure'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CustomerBillingProcedure'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - CustomerBillingProcedure
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about an active billing procedure
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about an active billing procedure
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CustomerBillingProcedure'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Invoicing/{invoicingId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Invoicing
      summary: UpBQ Update details of a generated invoice
      description: UpBQ Update details of a generated invoice
      operationId: UpdateInvoicing
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InvoicingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateInvoicingRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateInvoicingResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Invoicing/{invoicingId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Invoicing
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a sent invoice
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a sent invoice
      operationId: RetrieveInvoicing
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InvoicingID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveInvoicingResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/TrackingandReminders/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - BQ - TrackingandReminders
      summary: InBQ Initiate tracking and reminder task against an active billing procedure
      description: InBQ Initiate tracking and reminder task against an active billing procedure
      operationId: InitiateTrackingandReminders
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateTrackingandRemindersRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateTrackingandRemindersResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/TrackingandReminders/{trackingandremindersId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - TrackingandReminders
      summary: RwBQ Retrieve details about tracking and reminder activity
      description: RwBQ Retrieve details about tracking and reminder activity
      operationId: RetrieveTrackingandReminders
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/TrackingandRemindersID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveTrackingandRemindersResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Payments/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - BQ - Payments
      summary: InBQ Initiate payment processing against a billing transaction
      description: InBQ Initiate payment processing against a billing transaction
      operationId: InitiatePayments
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CustomerBillingProcedure'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiatePaymentsResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Payments/{paymentsId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Payments
      summary: UpBQ Update payment details for a billing transaction
      description: UpBQ Update payment details for a billing transaction
      operationId: UpdatePayments
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentsID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdatePaymentsRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdatePaymentsResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /CustomerBilling/{customerbillingId}/Payments/{paymentsId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Payments
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve payment processing details
      description: ReBQ Retrieve payment processing details
      operationId: RetrievePayments
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CustomerBillingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaymentsID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrievePaymentsResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    CustomerBillingProcedure:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingTransactionType:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingTransactionDescription:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        CustomerAgreementReference:
          type: object
        CustomerBillingProductandServiceOrActionDescription:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingParty:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingAddress:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingPeriod:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingStatement:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingAmount:
          type: number
        CustomerBillingPaymentDueDate:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingPaymentDetails:
          type: string
        CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
          type: string
    Payments:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentTransactionReference:
          type: object
        PaymentTransaction:
          type: string
    Invoicing:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerInvoiceRecord:
          type: string
        InvoiceDate:
          type: string
        DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
          type: object
        CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
          type: object
        Invoice:
          type: string
        InvoicingWorkProduct:
          type: string
    TrackingandReminders:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerReminderContactRecord:
          type: string
        ContactMessage:
          type: string
        ContactDate:
          type: string
        ContactResult:
          type: string
        TrackingandRemindersResult:
          type: string
        TrackingandRemindersWorkProduct:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateCustomerBillingProcedureResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
    UpdateInvoicingRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        Invoicing:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerInvoiceRecord:
              type: string
            InvoiceDate:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
              type: object
            InvoicingWorkProduct:
              type: string
    UpdateInvoicingResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        Invoicing:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerInvoiceRecord:
              type: string
            InvoiceDate:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
              type: object
            InvoicingWorkProduct:
              type: string
    RetrieveInvoicingResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingTransactionType:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingTransactionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerAgreementReference:
              type: object
            CustomerBillingProductandServiceOrActionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingParty:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAddress:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPeriod:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingStatement:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAmount:
              type: number
            CustomerBillingPaymentDueDate:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentDetails:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        Invoicing:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerInvoiceRecord:
              type: string
            InvoiceDate:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
              type: object
            InvoicingWorkProduct:
              type: string
    InitiateTrackingandRemindersRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingTransactionType:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingTransactionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerAgreementReference:
              type: object
            CustomerBillingProductandServiceOrActionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingParty:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAddress:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPeriod:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingStatement:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAmount:
              type: number
            CustomerBillingPaymentDueDate:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentDetails:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        Invoicing:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerInvoiceRecord:
              type: string
            InvoiceDate:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
              type: object
    InitiateTrackingandRemindersResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        TrackingandReminders:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerReminderContactRecord:
              type: string
            ContactMessage:
              type: string
            ContactDate:
              type: string
            ContactResult:
              type: string
            TrackingandRemindersResult:
              type: string
            TrackingandRemindersWorkProduct:
              type: string
    RetrieveTrackingandRemindersResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingTransactionType:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingTransactionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerAgreementReference:
              type: object
            CustomerBillingProductandServiceOrActionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingParty:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAddress:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPeriod:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingStatement:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAmount:
              type: number
            CustomerBillingPaymentDueDate:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentDetails:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        Invoicing:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerInvoiceRecord:
              type: string
            InvoiceDate:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceInstanceReference:
              type: object
        TrackingandReminders:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerReminderContactRecord:
              type: string
            ContactMessage:
              type: string
            ContactDate:
              type: string
            ContactResult:
              type: string
            TrackingandRemindersResult:
              type: string
            TrackingandRemindersWorkProduct:
              type: string
    InitiatePaymentsResponse:

          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        Payments:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionReference:
              type: object
    UpdatePaymentsRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        Payments:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionReference:
              type: object
    UpdatePaymentsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        Payments:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionReference:
              type: object
    RetrievePaymentsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerBillingProcedure:
          type: object
          properties:
            CustomerBillingTransactionType:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingTransactionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerAgreementReference:
              type: object
            CustomerBillingProductandServiceOrActionDescription:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingParty:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingAddress:

            CustomerBillingPeriod:
              type: string
            CustomerBillingStatement:

            CustomerBillingAmount:

              type: string
            CustomerBillingPaymentSchedule:
              type: string
        Payments:
          type: object
          properties:
            PaymentTransactionReference:
              type: object
  parameters:
    CustomerBillingID:
      name: customerbillingId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    PaymentsID:
      name: paymentsId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false

      name: invoicingId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    TrackingandRemindersID:
      name: trackingandremindersId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false

  requestBodies:
    CustomerBillingProcedure:
      required: true
      content:

    UpdateInvoicingRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:

    InitiateTrackingandRemindersRequest:
      required: true
      content:

    UnauthorizedError:
